title: looking for support main for rank team
body: comment for willing to try for position

replies.body:
IGN: PROJECT WUKONG
Rank: Silver 2
GMT +10

Top Champs: Wukong, Maokai, Rumble, Shen (Willing to learn more if needed)
Support Champs: Thresh, Braum, Leona, Blitz

Yeah, I'm a support main, can play every support proficiently but will put in the time and effort to learn the ones you want. I will be very dedicated.
P.S. I'm free to play almost always except school hours and a few hours on the weekends when I'm working.
Thanks
-Traloop
I understand I'm only a bronzie but take a chance man, I might actually be good, at least trial me. Thanks for your time.

Hey, been playing support from Season 2.

Play supports such as Thresh, Leona, Soraka, Jarvan.

Add me "Noblesse" :)
